name: Oni-Koi
description:
Oni-Koi is inspired by the legend of the Dragon's Gate, which tells the story of a koi carp that, after traveling up a river to its source, was transformed into a celestial dragon for the rest of eternity.

You will embody this carp on its ascent while avoiding the obstacles that appear in your path and observing the changes happening in the world around you. Other carps will join and accompany you during your journey.

Oni-koi has been developed in 7 days to participate in the #jamOnFDI2021, organized by the Faculty of Computer Science of the Complutense University of Madrid within the events of the VII Semana de la Informática.
